meanings.definition: Moving with quick, small movements from side to side
meanings.sent1: The puppy was wigglier than the sleepy cat.
meanings.sent2: The snake was wigglier than the stick.
meanings.sent3: The wigglier worm tried to dance with the leaf.
meanings.sent4: Her wigglier dance moves made her the star of the party.
meanings.sent5: The wigglier branches of the tree swayed in the wind.

meanings.definition: Having more wiggling movements than something else
meanings.sent1: The wigglier caterpillar outpaced the slower one.
meanings.sent2: The fish was wigglier than the turtle in the tank.
meanings.sent3: The wigglier jellyfish challenged the calm sea creatures to a race.
meanings.sent4: Her wigglier hair bounced with every step she took.
meanings.sent5: The wigglier ribbon fluttered in the breeze next to the still one.
